rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Why do they hate
Earthlings so much?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's certain there's something more
than just hatred driving them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0004
rows.name: Something like their own survival being threatened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's not like we came out to space
by choice either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0006
rows.name:
We lost Earth[ST:wide ]―
And we came all the way to a planet like this, and still[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0008
rows.name: Sorry, I just ended up remembering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Colonel Elma,
we'll head back to NLA first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0012
rows.name: Thank you for your support on the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Irina had a younger brother
who was also Gwin's best friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0015
rows.name:
He couldn't get on the White Whale.
He shared Earth's fate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07070100_MSG0017
rows.name:
It's a common story[ST:wide ]―
Don't want to just leave it at that, but that's reality.[ST:wait ]
